title: FS: 12 card lot of T202 w/ HOFers including Mathewson
author: Michael Peich

posts.post_title: FS: 12 card lot of T202 w/ HOFers including Mathewson
posts.post_content:
This 12 card lot includes HOFers Mathewson, Baker, Collins, Tinker, Chance, Wallace and Griffith. Nice eye appeal except for those damnable tack holes! The Hassan backs are all clean--scans are available upon request. The lot for $440 + shipping.

Send an email if interested: [url]mpeich12@gmail.com[/url]. Thanks for looking!

Sale Pending

Cheers, Mike
